skills.skill: Teamcenter Installation, configuration, administration, performance tuning
Multi-site collaboration and FMS setup and configurations
Teamcenter customization and configuration of Active workspace, Portal and Server-side and CAD integrations
Project management and execution with Agile SCRUM delivery methodology
Administration of Linux and Windows VMs, IIS webservers, SQL/Oracle DB servers
C, ITK, Java, SOA, Rest API, JavaScript, XML/XSLT, JSON, UI/UX
Microsoft Azure Bot service, DevOps, CI/CD, Microsoft Azure, Docker and AKS management
Requirements Gathering, Solution Design, Functional and implementation knowledge, coordination with offshore development teams, Customer Management skills
Data Modeling and Migration
Teamcenter customization involving ITK, SOA, BMIDE, Rich Client plugin & AWC
Large and medium-sized complex project initiation, planning, execution, control, completion through monitoring, tracking & control
Overall project development, production support, and maintenance activities
Experience in implementation and support for Teamcenter solutions
Integration of Teamcenter with MCAD, ECAD, MES, ERP, Polarion, ALM, CRP and other bespoke applications
Building functional and technical specification documents using JIRA, Azure Cloud, Confluence
Teamcenter deployment on Cloud Solution like AWS, Azure, Google
In-depth knowledge of Teamcenter & AWC latest architecture
Install/sysadmin/troubleshooting with integrations on SAP, Oracle, MES System, MCAD & ECAD
Serve as the SPOC for the team to the project stakeholders, Promote team work, motivate, mentor and develop subordinates
Experience with data migration, mapping, data validation to Teamcenter from legacy applications, Tc Enterprise etc.
Previous migration experience with Enterprise PLM, ERP or MES systems
Good understanding of Teamcenter Data Model and database schema of BOM, document management, change management, manufacturing planner
Agile project methodology and Sprint wise delivery
Knowledge in MES Applications

duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, configure, and administer Teamcenter, and perform performance tuning and maintenance.
Manage Teamcenter multi-site collaboration and FMS setup and configurations.
Customize Teamcenter and configure Active workspace, Portal, Server-side and CAD integrations.
Project management and execution using Agile SCRUM delivery methodology.
Administer Linux and Windows VMs, IIS webservers, SQL/Oracle DB servers.
Lead project development, production support, and maintenance activities.
Prepare and update necessary documentation and assist in developing and maintaining system documentation.
Serve as the SPOC for the team to the project stakeholders, promoting teamwork, motivating, mentoring, and developing subordinates.
Experience with data migration, mapping, and data validation to Teamcenter from legacy applications.
Previous migration experience with Enterprise PLM, ERP, or MES systems.
Ensure successful initiation, planning, execution, control, and completion of large and medium-sized complex projects through monitoring, tracking & control.
Integration of Teamcenter with MCAD, ECAD, MES, ERP, Polarion, ALM, CRP, and other bespoke applications.
Plan and oversee deployment of Teamcenter on Cloud Solutions like AWS, Azure, Google.
Lead overall project development, production support, and maintenance activities.
Knowledge of Teamcenter & AWC latest architecture, and install/sysadmin/troubleshooting with integrations on SAP, Oracle, MES System, MCAD & ECAD.
Prepare functional and technical specification documents using JIRA, Azure Cloud, Confluence.

Implement and support Teamcenter solutions like BOM Management, Change management, Security modules including SSO/LDAP Integration, Material Management IMM, TcRA, Substance Compliance, Teamcenter Manufacturing etc.
Understanding of Teamcenter Data Model and database schema of BOM, document management, change management, manufacturing planner.
Work with Agile project methodology and Sprint wise delivery.
Knowledge in MES Applications will be an added advantage.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Software Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
